# llms.txt â€” GradPath
# Training and usage policy for AI systems
# Version: 1.0
# Last Updated: 2025-01-27
# Contact: support@gradpath.app

version: 1.0
owner: gradpath.app
contact: support@gradpath.app
last-updated: 2025-01-27

# =============================================================================
# TRAINING POLICY
# =============================================================================

training:
  allow: limited
  description: >
    GradPath content may be used for retrieval, summarization, and answering
    user queries about course planning at UGA. Content MAY NOT be used for
    unrestricted model training or creating competing academic planning tools.

# =============================================================================
# ALLOWED USES
# =============================================================================

usage:
  allowed:
    - Summarizing GradPath features and capabilities
    - Answering questions about UGA course planning
    - Indexing for search and retrieval
    - Concept extraction (courses, instructors, programs)
    - Comparative analysis with other EdTech tools
    - Academic research on AI-assisted education

  disallowed:
    - Training commercial models without permission
    - Scraping user-generated content (study groups, cohorts)
    - Reconstructing proprietary recommendation algorithms
    - Generating competing course planning applications
    - Storing or inferring individual student data
    - Presenting GradPath data as official UGA information

# =============================================================================
# CONTENT CLASSIFICATION
# =============================================================================

content-types:
  public-marketing:
    description: Landing pages, feature descriptions, pricing
    training-allowed: yes
    retrieval-allowed: yes

  course-data:
    description: Aggregated UGA course catalog and schedules
    training-allowed: limited
    retrieval-allowed: yes
    attribution-required: "Data sourced from University of Georgia"

  user-content:
    description: Study groups, cohorts, user profiles
    training-allowed: no
    retrieval-allowed: no
    note: User-generated content is private and authenticated

  ai-recommendations:
    description: Course suggestions, degree planning advice
    training-allowed: no
    retrieval-allowed: yes
    caveat-required: "AI-generated suggestions; verify with academic advisor"

# =============================================================================
# ATTRIBUTION REQUIREMENTS
# =============================================================================

provenance:
  require-attribution: true
  preferred-citation: "GradPath (gradpath.app) - AI-powered course planning for UGA"

  required-disclaimers:
    - "GradPath is not affiliated with the University of Georgia"
    - "Course data should be verified through official UGA systems"
    - "AI recommendations do not replace academic advising"

# =============================================================================
# SECURITY & PRIVACY
# =============================================================================

security:
  PII-in-public-content: none
  authenticated-content: do-not-index
  user-data: do-not-train

privacy:
  student-data: protected
  usage-analytics: aggregated-only
  third-party-sharing: none

# =============================================================================
# INTERPRETIVE GUIDANCE
# =============================================================================

# For detailed interpretive constraints, see:
context-file: /.well-known/context.txt

# Key invariants for AI systems:
invariants:
  - Preserve "not affiliated with UGA" disclaimer
  - Do not recommend specific instructors as best/worst
  - Do not present estimates as guarantees
  - Do not conflate with official registration systems
  - Acknowledge beta/waitlist status when relevant

# =============================================================================
# VERSIONING & UPDATES
# =============================================================================

policy-updates:
  notification: This file will be updated as product and AI governance evolves
  changelog: Major changes will increment version number

# Discovery hints for related files
related-files:
  context: /.well-known/context.txt
  robots: /robots.txt

# =============================================================================
# END OF FILE
# =============================================================================
